Bio

I am a husband and father of three wonderful boys. My time not coding is spent with them. This year I wanted to better my life and the life for my family. So I decided to pursue a career in web development. With hard work, determination, and self motivation, I am making that dream come true. I love coding, coming up with new ideas, and new websites to make.


Im experienced with the basics of Web Development, Javascript, Css, and Html. My personal favorite framework to use is React, but Im familiar with Angular and Vue.js. Not very experienced with the backend but Im learning Python and Node.js.
